Uses of Class
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Expression

Packages that use Expression 
Package Description
edu.citadel.cprl  
edu.citadel.cprl.ast  

  • Uses of Expression in edu.citadel.cprl

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Expression Parser.parseExpression()
    Parse the following grammar rules:
    expression = relation ( logicalOp relation )* .
    logicalOp = "and" | "or" .
    Expression Parser.parseFactor()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    factor = "not" factor | constValue | namedValue | functionCall | "(" expression ")" .
    Expression Parser.parseRelation()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    relation = simpleExpr ( relationalOp simpleExpr )? .
    relationalOp = "=" | "!=" | "<" | "<=" | ">" | ">=" .
    Expression Parser.parseSimpleExpr()
    Parse the following grammar rules:
    simpleExpr = ( addingOp )? term ( addingOp term )* .
    addingOp = "+" | "-" .
    Expression Parser.parseTerm()
    Parse the following grammar rules:
    term = factor ( multiplyingOp factor )* .
    multiplyingOp = "*" | "/" | "mod" .
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return types with arguments of type Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Expression> Parser.parseActualParameters()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    actualParameters = "(" expressions ")" .
    java.util.List<Expression> Parser.parseExpressions()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    expressions = expression ( "," expression )* .

  • Uses of Expression in edu.citadel.cprl.ast

    Subclasses of Expression in edu.citadel.cprl.ast 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AddingExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for an adding expression.
    class  BinaryExpr
    Base class for all binary expressions.
    class  ConstValue
    The abstract syntax tree node for a constant value expression, which is either a literal or a declared constant identifier representing a literal.
    class  FunctionCall
    The abstract syntax tree node for a function call expression.
    class  LogicalExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for a logical expression.
    class  MultiplyingExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for a multiplying expression.
    class  NamedValue
    The abstract syntax tree node for a named value.
    class  NegationExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for a negation expression.
    class  NotExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for a not expression.
    class  RelationalExpr
    The abstract syntax tree node for a relational expression.
    class  UnaryExpr
    Base class for all unary expressions.
    class  Variable
    The abstract syntax tree node for a variable, which is any named variable that can appear on the left hand side of an assignment statement.
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl.ast that return Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Expression BinaryExpr.getLeftOperand()
    Returns the left operand of the binary expression.
    Expression UnaryExpr.getOperand()
    Returns the operand for this unary expression.
    Expression BinaryExpr.getRightOperand()
    Returns the right operand of the binary expression.
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl.ast that return types with arguments of type Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Expression> OutputStmt.getExpressions()
    Returns the list of expressions for this output statement.
    java.util.List<Expression> Variable.getIndexExprs()
    Returns the list of index expressions for an array.
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with parameters of type Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void LoopStmt.setWhileExpr​(Expression whileExpr)
    Set the while expression for this loop statement.
    Method parameters in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with type arguments of type Expression 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Variable.setIndexExprs​(java.util.List<Expression> indexExprs)
    Sets the list of index expressions for an array.
    Constructors in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with parameters of type Expression 
    Constructor Description
    AddingExpr​(Expression leftOperand, Token operator, Expression rightOperand)
    Construct an adding expression with the operator ("+" or "-") and the two operands.
    AssignmentStmt​(Variable variable, Expression expr, Position assignPosition)
    Construct an assignment statement with a variable, an expression, and the position of the assignment operator.
    BinaryExpr​(Expression leftOperand, Token operator, Expression rightOperand)
    Construct a binary expression with its left operand, operator, and right operand.
    ElsifPart​(Expression booleanExpr, java.util.List<Statement> thenStmts)
    Construct an elsif part with the specified boolean expression and list of "then" statements.
    ExitStmt​(Expression whenExpr, LoopStmt loopStmt)
    Construct an exit statement with its optional "when" expression (which should be null if there is no "when" expression) and a reference to the enclosing loop statement.
    IfStmt​(Expression booleanExpr, java.util.List<Statement> thenStmts, java.util.List<ElsifPart> elsifParts, java.util.List<Statement> elseStmts)
    Construct an if statement with the specified boolean expression and list of "then" statements.
    LogicalExpr​(Expression leftOperand, Token operator, Expression rightOperand)
    Construct a logical expression with the operator ("and" or "or") and the two operands.
    MultiplyingExpr​(Expression leftOperand, Token operator, Expression rightOperand)
    Construct a multiplying expression with the operator ("*", "/", or "mod") and the two operands.
    NegationExpr​(Token operator, Expression operand)
    Construct a negation expression with the specified operator ("-") and operand.
    NotExpr​(Token operator, Expression operand)
    Construct a not expression with the specified operator ("not") and operand.
    RelationalExpr​(Expression leftOperand, Token operator, Expression rightOperand)
    Construct a relational expression with the operator ("=", "<=", etc.) and the two operands.
    ReturnStmt​(SubprogramDecl subprogramDecl, Expression returnExpr, Position returnPosition)
    Construct a return statement with a reference to the enclosing subprogram and the expression for the value being returned, which may be null.
    UnaryExpr​(Token operator, Expression operand)
    Construct a unary expression with the specified operator and operand.
    Constructor parameters in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with type arguments of type Expression 
    Constructor Description
    FunctionCall​(Token funcId, java.util.List<Expression> actualParams, FunctionDecl funcDecl)
    Construct a function call with the function identifier (name), the list of actual parameters, and a reference to the function declaration.
    OutputStmt​(java.util.List<Expression> expressions)
    Construct an output statement with the list of expressions.
    ProcedureCallStmt​(Token procId, java.util.List<Expression> actualParams, ProcedureDecl procDecl)  
    Variable​(NamedDecl decl, Position position, java.util.List<Expression> indexExprs)
    Construct a variable with a reference to its declaration, its position, and a list of index expressions.
    WritelnStmt​(java.util.List<Expression> expressions)
    Construct a writeln statement with the list of expressions.
    WriteStmt​(java.util.List<Expression> expressions)
    Construct a write statement with the list of expressions.
